title: Parenting Prowess, with Camila Alves McConaughey
description:
From talking toddlers into eating better with her new book, Just One Bite, to educating your older kids so they have better food habits, Camila Alves McConaughey is on to share all her parenting tips and strategies to raise the healthiest kids and the happiest family! 

Guest Links:

IG: @camilamcconaughey

FB: @iamcamilaalves

Website: www.womenoftoday.com


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Jillian Michaels Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1880466198675549

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com
